extendedInfo.description: Spanish Baby Flash Cards is now available for Android!  Categories include: Food items, Animals, Alphabet, Transportation, Numbers, Colors & Shapes, Clothing, Household items, Body Parts, Outdoor items, Music Instruments/Arts & Learning. â Over 450 words! â 11 Categories - All in 1 App! â FREE! â Kids tested - they love it! Parents tested - they love it! â Building vocabulary has never been so much fun â Large words and letters â Large icons and buttons â Professional voice overs recorded in production studio â High quality images â Real sounds where applicable â Question mode for parent-child interaction â Great memory building exercise Building strong Spanish vocabulary has never been so exciting for preschoolers and toddlers. eFlash Educational Baby Flash Cards in Spanish features over 450 high quality images with text and voice overs. There are additional real sounds where applicable (such as a lion's roar or an ambulance siren) to enhance visual and auditory learning and memory simultaneously. Parents have the option to turn voice overs off during parent-child learning session and turn voice overs on when the child is self-learning. They can enable Question Mode to display 4 images and ask the child to click on the right answer. Complexity of words is perfect for ages 1 to 4 so two or more young siblings can play together and even teach each other!

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Thu s app has all the basics! It is great for reminding me and teaching my daughter. She is reeeally interested in it and excited to learn more
reviews.author: Jacklyn Lovato-Kraut

reviews.title: Worst app ever!
reviews.comment: Every time I open this app it stops working. Never once has my son been able to use it.
reviews.author: Rachel Elliotte

reviews.title: Very easy for a toddler
reviews.comment: My two and three-year-olds picked up so many words in this new and improved version.
reviews.author: Leng Heng

reviews.title: Most part love this app.
reviews.comment: Would have gave it more but there are a few mistranslated words. For example cepillo de dientes is not hair brush its tooth brush...but other than that I do like this app.
reviews.author: Gianni Rivera

reviews.title: Flash cards
reviews.comment: My son and I enjoy this program as a bedtime activity. Really helped with my intro to Spanish.
reviews.author: Marty M

reviews.title: Letters skipped, lots of misspelling
reviews.comment: Pronunciation is mainly correct but letters are frequently skipped and LOTS of misspelling.  Ni\303\261o used for \303\261. Bananas instead of pl\303\241tanos. A lot of words that are the same in English. May be an issue if you want to learn Spanish from a specific region.
reviews.author: Jessica Tompson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Its good for adults 2
reviews.author: Jamie Phiniezy

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: EASY TO LEARN
reviews.author: Brittney Nicholson

reviews.title: Amazing app!
reviews.comment: My daughter loves it!
reviews.author: Maryanne Nnake

reviews.title: Not only misspelled words...
reviews.comment: But you have \"anaranjado\" for the word orange...but you meant \"narjana\". One is a color and the other a fruit. Obviously your Spanish is just using a translator.
reviews.author: Jeff P

reviews.title: Works good
reviews.comment: So far working good

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: Okay

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: A mi nene le encanta esta app y esta aprendiendo espanol
reviews.author: Elisa Campos

reviews.title: After update it works
reviews.comment: I\'m glad this works again, my daughter loves it. She is learning so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: The sound doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Jennifer Partridge Kiley

reviews.title: app.
reviews.comment: You need to fix a lot of mistakes, some words are misspelled, some the pronunciation is in English, some like circle the audio is saying something completely different. Your alphabet is missing. the letter W... really just skip the letter because is hard to find a word? You should also have the option of the alphabet just with their sound and just the letters. About the Spanish itself it should stick to standard Spanish, right now it has regionalismo and some words are not standard in a lot of countries
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: I cannot even use this.  It crashes on my galaxy nexus as soon as I open it.  I sent a report in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Sensation 4g
reviews.comment: Installed and uninstalled twice and it still crashes on the first screen that appears
reviews.author: Jaime Ochoa

reviews.title: very good
reviews.comment: has many options highly recomend it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix the glitches, could be a great app
reviews.comment: It takes forever to start then force closes. I\'ve only been able to play it twice. Also can you make the words more common. EX; candy= dulce, pineapple= pi\303\261a and instead of boat for the letter b it could be ba\303\261o which would be more useful for a child learning Spanish. But I like how it shows pictures and the sound, def has potential to be a great app but as for now uninstalling!
reviews.author: A Google User
